Text: Another series unknown to me.  I do enjoy Trillo, however, and am a huge Sherlock Holmes fan, so thank you again LTS

whaletail935, I enjoyed these quite a bit. For one, they're official translations, which really makes a big difference most of the time (and that's no slight to anybody doing unofficial translation, because those are very much appreciated, too - it's just that the official translations are done by professionals and often include consulting from the original author, which makes a different). Also, the style of art on the cover doesn't exactly match the interior. The interior art, to me, looks a lot like Kyle Baker's stuff, but with a good bit more realism in the mix. Great looking stuff.

This comment is not specific to the book, but a huge thanks for your body of work - it's just amazing. I've enjoyed so many books that I would NEVER have seen any other way.  Don't know how you get the time to do this, but just wanted you to know it is much appreciated.

You're most welcome, panbam. Glad you dig the ups. Turning some people on to books they wouldn't normally see everyday is exactly why I started doing this. And to be honest, I don't have the time. I'll probably be slowing down quite a bit in the very near future. There's still some things I want to get uploaded before then, though. So, back to it...
Man, I so need to do a better job at proofreading before I hit submit here. I'm a total grammar and spelling NERD and I make HUGE mistakes here on the regular. *sigh*
